org.jlab.mya.nexus

Class PooledNexus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.mya.nexus.DataNexus
      • org.jlab.mya.nexus.PooledNexus

  • public class PooledNexus
extends DataNexus
    A Mya DataNexus which pools resources for later use. This DataNexus delegates the connection pooling to one or more JNDI DataSources. Either a container (application server) such as Tomcat needs to be configured with the JNDI DataSources or the StandaloneJndi and StandaloneConnectionPools classes can be used.
